project_descr: Civil Society Index to ascertain the level of CSO engagement and type of supportive environment they are operating in.

outputs.output_descr: This programme of assistance to the Zambia Council for Social Development (ZCSD) intends to support ZCSD in its endeavour to conduct a civil society index in 2009.  The Civil Society Index is an initiative developed by CIVICUS and has been successfully tested in various countries.  It is an important element for assessing the state of governance in a particular country as it measures the vibrancy, the level of organisations and the values of civil society in particular country.
